name: Payment Plans in Billing tab should be listed based on Program and Bill type when the program is Excess Workers Compensation

testSteps.description: Given underwriter has ability to create policy

And with Company
| Company |
| Protective Insurance Company |

And select program
| program |
| Excess Workers Compensation |

And with Insured address and location details as
| StreetAddress | City | State | Zip | Country |
| 600 W College Ave | Tallahassee | Florida | 32306 | United States |

And with Excess Workers Compensation details
| CExcessPremiumFactor | CExcessLossRatioVal | CExcLossPurePremiumF | CAggregateLimitCharge | CTotalFixExpense | CVariableExpRatio |
| 0.01 | 100 | 21.00 | 100 | 100 | 100 |

And with Account Insurance details as
| Code | PremiumNotSubjectToInsuranceSplit | PremiumNotSubjectToInsurancePremium | PremiumSubjectToInsuranceSplit | PremiumSubjectToInsurancePremium |
| W01 | 1000000 | 1000 | 1000000 | 1000 |

And with Collateral and Deposit details
| CCollateralCheck | CFormulaPriColl | CFormulaSecColl | CRequestPriColl | CRequestSecColl |
| Y | 10 | 10 | 10 | 10 |
When underwriter calculates premium for quote
And underwriter is on home page
And underwriter navigates to Payment Plan

Then Bill type should have the following options
| Direct Bill |
| Wholesale Bill |

And Pay plan should be below options
| Annual |
| Down Payment Plus 9 Installments |
| Down Payment Plus 9 Installments - AmWins |
| Monthly |
| Monthly with Security Deposit |
| Quarterly |
| Semi-Annual |
| Full Pay |
